actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Recognizing the contributions of musician Chuck Brown, the Godfather of Go-Go, to music and to the District of Columbia and expressing support for the designation of a Chuck Brown Day.

summary.text:
Recognizes the contributions to music and to the District of Columbia of musician Chuck Brown, the Godfather of Go-Go.

Expresses support for the designation of a Chuck Brown Day.

titles.title: Recognizing the contributions of musician Chuck Brown, the Godfather of Go-Go, to music and to the District of Columbia and expressing support for the designation of a Chuck Brown Day.
